 Special Collections & University Archives 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Email 
 (951) 827-3233 
 (951) 827-4673 
 
 
 Special Collections & University Archives provides research assistance and instructional support for students and faculty for manuscripts, archives, photographs, books, and other rare and unusual materials, in a wide range of subject areas. Located on the 4th floor of the Tomás Rivera Library. When planning a visit,  please check our  hours .   Please also consider using our  Virtual Office Hours  during the COVID-19 closure .
